CarnivalDailyChallengeTemplate.Title: Merry Land
CarnivalDailyChallengeTemplate.Description: Play games in Merry Land for 3 times

CarnivalDailyChallengeTemplate.Title: Balens Top-Up
CarnivalDailyChallengeTemplate.Description: Recharge any amount of Balens to receive points

CarnivalDailyChallengeTemplate.Title: Tree of Ancients
CarnivalDailyChallengeTemplate.Description: Energize a friend's Tree of Ancients once

CarnivalDailyChallengeTemplate.Title: Archaeology Astrology
CarnivalDailyChallengeTemplate.Description: Join Archaeology or Astrology 5 times in Wilds

CarnivalDailyChallengeTemplate.Title: Sylph Arena
CarnivalDailyChallengeTemplate.Description: Win a fight in Sylph Arena twice

CarnivalDailyChallengeTemplate.Title: MP Dungeon
CarnivalDailyChallengeTemplate.Description: Finish 1 MP dungeon in Hall of Heroes
